text: Phira saitana (ibalisa) ne usa rukha de rahi' dovam nu gumaraha kara dita ate unham nu usa anadama'i jivana vicom kadha dita. Jisa vica uha sana. Ate asim kiha tusim sare utaro ithom. Tusi ika duje de vairi ho ate tuhade la'i dharati te riha'isa ate kama cala'una ika khasa same taka nisabata kara dita gi'a hai
